<h1 align="center">MERN-Auth-Guardian üîí </h1>

MERN-Auth-Guardian is a powerful full-stack authentication solution built with MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js üåü. It offers secure JWT-based authentication üîê, role-based access control, and user-friendly interfaces üñ•Ô∏è, making it an excellent choice for modern web applications. Designed for seamless integration, it ensures robust security, scalability, and a smooth user experience. With MERN-Auth-Guardian, developers can build apps with confidence, knowing their authentication system is reliable and efficient üöÄ.

[![Github License](https://img.shields.io/github/license/UjjwalSaini07/MERN-Auth-Guardian)](https://github.com/UjjwalSaini07/MERN-Auth-Guardian/blob/main/LICENSE)
[![Info](https://img.shields.io/badge/Project-Info-blue?style=flat&logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)](https://github.com/UjjwalSaini07/MERN-Auth-Guardian/blob/main/README.md)
[![Generic badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/Owner-@Ujjwal-<COLOR>.svg)](https://github.com/UjjwalSaini07/MERN-Auth-Guardian)
[![GitHub stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/UjjwalSaini07/MERN-Auth-Guardian?style=social&label=Star&maxAge=2592100)](https://github.com/UjjwalSaini07/MERN-Auth-Guardian/stargazers)
[![Github Release](https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/UjjwalSaini07/MERN-Auth-Guardian)](https://github.com/UjjwalSaini07/MERN-Auth-Guardian)

## Key Features üéØ
- üåü Intuitive user interfaces for effortless navigation and enhanced user experience.
- üîê Robust JWT-based authentication ensuring secure and reliable access control.
- üìä Comprehensive role-based access tailored for diverse user permissions and needs.
- ‚ö° Highly scalable backend powered by Express.js and Node.js framework.
- üì¶ Seamless MongoDB integration providing efficient and reliable data management solutions.
- üîÑ Smooth session handling for uninterrupted, consistent user interactions and workflows.
- üöÄ Easy integration into modern web applications with minimal setup required.

## Technologies Used üë®üèª‚Äçüíª
- **Reactjs** ‚Äì A popular JavaScript library for building dynamic, responsive, and user-friendly web interfaces.  
- **Expressjs** ‚Äì A minimal and flexible Node.js web application framework for robust APIs.  
- **Node.js** ‚Äì A powerful runtime environment for executing JavaScript server-side, enabling efficient and scalable backend development.  
- **MongoDB** ‚Äì A NoSQL database offering high performance, scalability, and flexibility for modern applications.  
- **TailwindCSS** ‚Äì A utility-first CSS framework for creating stunning, responsive designs effortlessly.  
- **Docker** ‚Äì A containerization platform enabling seamless deployment, scalability, and efficient application management.  

## Installation üõ†Ô∏è
- First Read this [License](https://github.com/UjjwalSaini07/MERN-Auth-Guardian/blob/main/LICENSE) & their terms then proceed.
- Star the [Repository](https://github.com/UjjwalSaini07/MERN-Auth-Guardian)
- Clone the repository:
```bash
  git clone https://github.com/UjjwalSaini07/MERN-Auth-Guardian.git
```
- Navigate to the Frontend directory:
```bash
  cd frontend
```
- Install the necessary dependencies in this directory:
```bash
  pnpm install
```
- Navigate to the Backend directory:
```bash
  cd backend
```
- Install the necessary dependencies to navigate to the appropriate directory:
```bash
  pnpm install
```
- Contact to Me For Neccesaary Credential to Start the Server [Contact](https://github.com/UjjwalSaini07/MERN-Auth-Guardian/issues)

## Usage üñ•Ô∏è

- Start the backend development server
```bash
   pnpm start
 ```
- Start the frontend application
```bash
   pnpm start
 ```
- Open your browser and navigate to http://localhost:5173 to view the localhost website
